title: Stocks Set for Biggest Annual Advance in Six Years: Markets Wrap
description: Global stocks are poised for their biggest annual gain in six years, supported by the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate cuts and a surge in enthusiasm for artificial intelligence companies.
content: Global stocks are poised for their biggest annual gain in six years, supported by the Federal Reserve’s interest-rate cuts and a surge in enthusiasm for artificial intelligence companies.
